description: Dev contains handy functions and attributes for developers.

blocks.text: Dev contains handy functions and attributes for developers.

functions.name: SetGameThumbnail
functions.description: Takes a screenshot and sets it as a thumbnail for the game.

properties.name: DisplayBoxes
properties.description: Displays [Shape]s' bounding boxes when set to `true`. (`false` by default)

properties.name: DisplayColliders
properties.description: Displays collision boxes when set to `true`. (`false` by default)
